reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE the smell of this Rose Yoni oil. It smells like rose essential oil and the smell is not overpowering but does linger. I use this oil on any part of my body, and it also smells great in bath water.No complaints, with this product. Did I mention how much I LOVE this scent? Well, I do, and you will too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It smells great
reviews.reviewText: I'm not sure this is a better deodorizer than any other rose oil blend, but it does have a great rose smell. I thought it was also about as oily/non-oily as any other rose oil blend. As far as rose oil goes, this is very nice, and you get 2 bottles with this product. I do like this and I will continue to use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just love these oils. Just a drop or two into my underwear is enough to prevent from any smells during the special weeks. It doesn't smell like anything, not even roses, once it's applied, the bad smell just vanishes. It's perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for!
reviews.reviewText: This is the best thing to use DOWN THERE!!! You stay fresh all day and feel very clean. I love this oil! I will be getting this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soothing and good scent
reviews.reviewText: Very nice for after shaving. Its nice and soothing and not greasy feeling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A light scent and non-irritating!
reviews.reviewText: I was hoping the rose in the scent mix wouldn't overpower the other oils, and thankfully, it doesn't. It's a good but not overwhelming scent.I've been looking for a product like this to help moisturize my delicate personal areas, and this one is good because you can actually put it on your sensitive skin to keep it moist and without any unpleasant odors.You get two pretty large bottles, too, so these will last a while, or you can share one with a friend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty rose scent
reviews.reviewText: This is definitely a floral rose scented oil. Quite fragrant and will stay for quite a while. I know this is for personal use, but for dabbing on the wrist, it is a nice scent that can be worn as a bit of perfume, or added to arm pits for extending that natural deodorant. A little goes a very long ways. I really like this and would order again.
